data.text: @pushkarraj30 Hi Pushkar, thank you for contacting us. Please send us your booking reference via private message so that we may assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Sana.
@taayoomurray Hi, Please be advised that I have assisted you through private message. Kind regards, Ariel
@vsharma2023 Hi Vishal, please be advised that we have no control over the operations of airports. We sincerely hope that your case has been sorted in the meantime. Kind regards, Sana.

@Ronninglife Hi@ronninglife, we are sorry we failed to meet your satisfaction and have not been able to offer amicable resolution. We are sorry that we have no control over the outcome of your case.  Kind regards, Sana.
@richard_coxon We have different department that handles different queries. We only handle ticketing and reservations via this platform. Thank you for your understanding.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @Matthew432112 Hi Mat, please be advised that you have been assisted via private message. Kind regards, Sana.
@virnakai Hi@virnakai, thank you for contacting us. How can I assist you today? Kind regards, Sana.
@mirianchela Hi Mirian, I am truly sorry for the inconvenience caused by the loss of your 2 suitcases. With this link you can trace your lost luggage https://t.co/8wQQEEkPOp. Kind regards, Claire
@oliverflueckige Hallo Oliver, konntest Du die SWISS-Internetseite jetzt aufrufen oder hast Du immer noch Probleme beim Einloggen? Viele Grüsse, Claire

@G_Filioussis @NZZ Wir halten uns grundsätzlich an die Vorgaben der Behörden, bezüglich der Maskentragepflicht an Bord haben wir uns an den Empfehlungen des BAG orientiert. Aktuell bekannten Informationen über die Maskentragpflicht an Bord findest Du hier: https://t.co/vZaXnRdhfl. LG Claire

@G_Filioussis @NZZ Liebe Georgios, Masken sind auf Flügen von/nach Deutschland nicht obligatorisch. Da unsere Flugzeuge in der Schweiz immatrikuliert sind, gilt an Bord auch die Schweizer Gesetzgebung.

data.text: @Frau_Mueller2 @SunriserMa @lufthansa Ja, ich stimme Dir zu. Allerdings sind diese Entscheidungen nicht leicht zu treffen. Wir werden sehen, wie sich die Situation entwickelt... Viele Grüsse, Claire

@Stosskeil Liebe Stejsi, es tut mir leid, dass es auf diesem Flug nur noch das vegetarische Gericht für dich gab. Ich werde die Information intern weitergeben, damit so etwas nicht noch einmal vorkommt. Liebe Grüsse, Claire

@DavidWiederkehr Hallo David, ja es ist korrekt. Du musst deinen zweiten Vornamen im Feld "Zweiter Vorname" angeben. Es wird nicht auf dem Ticket angezeigt aber es ist für die Einreisebeamten ersichtlich. Viele Grüsse, Claire

@TaraUndSoWeiter @MarcFelixSerrao @SoeMaj Wir halten uns grundsätzlich an die Vorgaben der Behörden, bezüglich der Maskentragepflicht an Bord haben wir uns an den Empfehlungen des BAG orientiert.
Aktuell bekannten Informationen über die Maskentragpflicht an Bord und am Flughafen: https://t.co/vZaXnRdhfl. Grüsse, Claire

@TaraUndSoWeiter @MarcFelixSerrao @SoeMaj Hallo Tara, wir haben die Informationen intern überprüft. Die Masken sind auf Flügen von/nach Deutschland nicht obligatorisch. Da unsere Flugzeuge in der Schweiz immatrikuliert sind, gilt an Bord auch die Schweizer Gesetzgebung.
@Flowermariotti Hi Florencia, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

@lny83080910 @LH9713 @MarcFelixSerrao Hallo Iny, der Schutz unserer Passagiere ist für uns sehr wichtig. Die Impfpflicht für das fliegende Personal wurde aus Gründen der Gesundheitsvorsorge eingeführt. Viele Grüsse, Claire

@Lourdes_Velasco Hi Lourdes, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. I kindly ask if you can provide us with your booking code or ticket number via direct message, so that we may further assist you. Kind regards, Noah.

@Eidgenosse1291 @dextereins @NZZ Jedoch sind die Masken auf Flügen von/nach Deutschland nicht obligatorisch. Da unsere Flugzeuge in der Schweiz immatrikuliert sind, gilt an Bord auch die Schweizer Gesetzgebung. Viele Grüsse, Claire

@Eidgenosse1291 @dextereins @NZZ Airlines sind besonders von Einreisebeschränkungen betroffen. Diese können sich mitunter kurzfristig verändern. Die Einsatzplanung wird zu komplex, wenn zwischen geimpften und nicht geimpften Besatzungsmitgliedern unterschieden werden muss. Viele Grüsse, Claire

@Eidgenosse1291 @dextereins @NZZ Hallo Eidgenosse1291, ja die Impfpflicht gilt immer noch für das fliegende SWISS-Personal. Die Impfpflicht wurde einerseits aus Gründen der Gesundheitsvorsorge und andererseits aus organisatorischen Gründen eingeführt.

@RolfWeidmann @iamMonac0 @LH9713 @MarcFelixSerrao Hallo Rolf, ja du hast recht, Masken sind auf Flügen von/nach Deutschland nicht obligatorisch. Da unsere Flugzeuge in der Schweiz immatrikuliert sind, gilt an Bord auch die Schweizer Gesetzgebung. Wir können kaum warten dir am Bord wieder zu begrüssen! LG, Claire

data.text: @Frau_Mueller2 @SunriserMa @lufthansa Guten Tag Frau Müller, die Impfpflicht für das fliegende SWISS-Personal wurde einerseits aus Gründen der Gesundheitsvorsorge und andererseits aus organisatorischen Gründen eingeführt.

@Lourdes_Velasco Hi@lourdes_velasco, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that if the cancellation was made at the airport, then the airport will have to rebook you on a flight that best suits your preference. Kind regards, Noah.
@maxxis8 Hi Rafa, thank you for your response. Please note that once we have received and reviewed your email request, we will then revert accordingly. Kind Regards, Sam.

@jpirtle209 Hi Josh, Thank you for your message, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. I kindly ask if you have contacted the airport you last arrived at so that they may further assist you with your baggage. Kind regards, Noah.
@jpirtle209 We do hope that the above information will be deemed helpful, and we hope that your baggage will be located and delivered back to you promptly. Kind Regards, Sam.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @jpirtle209 Should you have already reported the missing baggage, you would have been provided with a baggage tracing reference number. You may then trace your baggage via the website as per the link provided: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH.

@jpirtle209 Hi Josh, thank you for reaching out to us. We regret that your baggage was lost during transportation with SWISS and apologize for any inconvenience experienced in this regard. Please note that you will need to liaise with the Lost and Found desk of your arrival airport.
@Matthew432112 Hi Mat, We sincerely apologize for the late reply and any inconvenience we may have caused. Be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.
@nialloc04 Hi Niall, as of now we may not be able to confirm the operating hours, however it would best to call them in the morning (local time in Cork, Ireland). Kind Regards, Sam.
@sweetcarolinatv Hi Colette, thanks for your response. Kindly note that we have sent you a private message to assist you further. Kind Regards, Sam.
@sesi_blue Hi, thank you for your response. We will revert shortly to you via DM as per your reservation request. Kind Regards, Sam.
@sweetcarolinatv Hi Collette. Will there be anything you would like us to assist you with? Kind Regards, Sam.
@sesi_blue Hello, kindly be advised that we have sent you a private message in order to assist you further. Kind Regards, Sam.

@nialloc04 Hi Niall, thank you for your response. You may contact the Swissport department  at Cork airport via the number provided: +353 21 432 9603. We do hope that the information provided will be deemed helpful  Kind Regards.
@sesi_blue Hi, thank you for your response. Apologies for the error, however should you need require any assistance on your reservation, feel free to let us know. Kind Regards, Sam.
@onlyoneofme Hello there. We do hope that you will have an enjoyable flight and we look forward to welcoming you on board soon. We wish you a pleasant day ahead. Kind Regards, Sam.

@sesi_blue Hi, thank you for reaching out to us. As per your request, you may contact the following number for our Swiss office in Mexico: +41 848 700 700. We do hope that the information provided deems helpful. Kind Regards, Sam.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @nialloc04 https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH. We do hope that you delayed luggage will be located and delivered back to you soon. Kind Regards, Sam.

@nialloc04 The relevant department will be in the better position to provide you with an update regarding your delayed/missing luggage. Should you have been provided with a baggage tracing reference number upon reporting, you may trace your baggage on the  website via the link provided:

@nialloc04 Hi Niall, thank you for reaching out to us. We are sorry that your luggage was misplaced while being transported by SWISS and apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Please be advised that you will need to contact the Lost and Found desk at your arrival airport.

@AboveBracknell Hello, thank you for providing an update. Kind Regards, Sam.

data.text: @sxmjuliana @united Hi there, you are most welcome. Should you require any further information, please feel free to let us know. Kind Regards, Sam.
@LaurentRodo Hi Laurent, kindly note that we have replied back to you via private message. Kind Regards, Sam.

@Vanesa53092250 Hi Vanesa, thank you for reaching to us. Kindly note that you may respond back to the email from our relevant department and request for a revaluation concerning your compensation request. Kind Regards, Sam.
@MommyShetty We do hope that your baggage will be located and delivered back to you as soon as possible. Kind Regards, Sam.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @MommyShetty You may trace your baggage online via the website as per the link provided: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH (click on to the baggage status website on the right hand side of the page). Once your baggage has been located, you will be contacted by our Lost and Found Team.

@MommyShetty The relevant department will be in a better position to provide you with an update regarding your delayed or missing baggage. Also, upon reporting your delayed or missing baggage, were you provided with a baggage tracing reference number?

@MommyShetty Hi there, thank you for your reaching out to us. We are sorry that your luggage was misplaced while being transported by SWISS and apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Please note that you will need to liaise with the Lost and Found desk of your arrival airport.

data.text: @sxmjuliana @united Hello, kindly note that you will need to check-in with Edelweiss given that your first first is with them. You may need to contact the airline for assistance.
@DavidWiederkehr Dies freut uns, David. Wir wünschen einen angenehmen Abend. Viele Grüsse, Ute

@nialloc04 Once the form has been successfully submitted, you will receive a case reference number in your email where you may follow up to send your receipts for the expenses made in order for our customer feedback team to assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Angie.

urls.title: Refund FAQs | SWISS
urls.description: Frequently asked questions about refunds can be found on this page, together with answers.

data.text: @nialloc04 Hi Niall, For compensation regarding your expenses towards your lost baggage you are kindly requested to fill out the form online via the link: https://t.co/dFI9q56Fnv.
@The_Real_Dane Hi, kindly provide us the case reference when you filed for the missing luggage.
@DavidWiederkehr Es tut uns leid, dass die Telefonwarteschleife momentan überfoerdert ist und ebenfalls, dass die FAQs nicht so eindeutig sind, wie es wünschenswert wäre, David. Viele Grüsse, Ute
@DavidWiederkehr Guten Abend, David. Es ist ausreichend, dass der erste Vor- und Nachname auf dem Ticket erscheinen. Weitere Vor- und Nachnamen müssen nicht aufgeführt werden. Viele Grüsse, Ute

@wedgy Once the form has been successfully submitted, you will receive a case reference number in your email where you may follow up to send your receipts for the expenses made in order for our customer feedback team to assist you accordingly. Kind regards, Angie.

data.text: @wedgy Hi, For compensation regarding your expenses towards your damaged baggage you are kindly requested to fill out the form online via the link: https://t.co/JXJm2A9Zfx.

data.text: @boardgame_mania Hi @boardgame_mania , Danke für deinen Tweet. Du kannst uns sehr gerne via Private Message kontaktieren, und deine Buchungsreferenz mit uns teilen. Liebe Grüsse, Loredana

@LizzyMelvin Different departments have different response time. We request your patience and understanding on this matter. You will receive a response from the relevant department once they locate your luggage.

@jyotirmoy189 We as the airline have no influence on these regulations. We do our best to provide you with the latest information, which you can find here: https://t.co/alBNvHvZBE. Kind regards, Angie.

@jyotirmoy189 . The travel restrictions and entry regulations are set by the country of your destination and/or transit and we recommend that you contact your local Consulate or Embassy for your destination country directly.
@jyotirmoy189 Hi Jyotirmoy, We have reviewed your query and would like to inform you that the continuously changing entry regulations can cause confusion.
@TheOnlyTusho Please be assured that we will endeavor to deliver your baggage  promptly as possible. Kind regards, Angie.

@TheOnlyTusho Once your baggage has been picked up by the courier it will be delivered to the address provided. Please be aware that this can take a variable amount of time depending upon the number of bags to be delivered as well as the time of the day.

@TheOnlyTusho Have you lodged a report with the Lost & Found office? You will be issued a file reference which is used to track the status of your baggage via the tracking link below:
https://t.co/YmkJtCMebq. Kind regards, Angie.

@TheOnlyTusho Hi, We are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. We apologize for the mishandling of your baggage and understand that this will be inconvenient for you. Please be assured that we will do all possible to assist you through this experience.
@The_Real_Dane Please be assured that we will endeavor to deliver your baggage  promptly as possible. Kind regards, Angie.

@The_Real_Dane Once your baggage has been picked up by the courier, it will be delivered to the address provided. Please be aware that this can take a variable amount of time depending upon the number of bags to be delivered as well as the time of the day.

@The_Real_Dane Have you lodged a report with the Lost & Found office? You will be issued a file reference, which is used to track the status of your baggage via the tracking link below.
https://t.co/YmkJtCMebq.

@The_Real_Dane Hi, We are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. We apologize for the mishandling of your baggage and understand that this will be inconvenient for you. Please be assured that we will do all possible to assist you through this experience.
@LizzyMelvin Kindly provide us your with your case reference so we can send a follow up.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @LizzyMelvin Hi Lizzy, We are so sorry to learn about the circumstances surrounding your experience with us and we apologize. However, if you would like to file a formal complaint, you may do so via the following link. We value customer feedback. https://t.co/JXJm2A9Zfx. Kind regards, Angie.

@robert_rudolph @MarcFelixSerrao @robert_rudolph Hallo Robert, unsere Machinen sind mit hochwertigste Luftfiltern ausgestattet, die eine Luftqualität garantieren wie in einem Operationsaal. Die Luft wird vertikal zirkuliert, und zudem wird die Luft alle 2 bis 3 Minuten ausgetauscht. Liebe Grüsse, Loredana
@jyotirmoy189 We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we look forward to your direct message. Kind regards, Lucy.

@jyotirmoy189 Hi Jyotirmoy Gupta, thank you for your message. We are sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Could you please send us a direct message with your booking reference number or ticket number, so that we can have a look at your booking.
@BrunoLauper Hi crosswind, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Lucy.

@RayBrow20364972 @RoboScottt @Vayama @TravixIntl @USDOT Hi Prune MacSween, thank you for your message and we are sorry to hear about this. Should you need any further assistance, please feel free to contact us. Kind regards, Lucy.
@carey_bill HI Bill Carey, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Lucy.
@LdZaDon Thank you, Paulolaide. Should you need any further assistance, please feel free to contact us. Have a good day. Kind regards, Lucy.
@LdZaDon Hi Paulolaide Aroyewun, thank you for your message. We have replied to your direct message. Kind regards, Lucy.
@jackiemuelle @VeganCardio @jackiemuelle Hi Jacqueline, Danke für dein positives Feedback. Hoffen, dich bald wieder an Bord Begrüssen zu können. Schönen Tag und liebe Grüsse, Loredana

@DsnYmaniac Hi Sevi, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Kindly requesting, if you can provide your booking code or ticket number via direct message, so that we may further assist you. Kind regards, Noah.
@deals_airlines Hi CheapAirlinesDeals, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Lucy.
@AboveBracknell Hi Above Bracknell Bot, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Lucy.
@ThWldtr Hi The Tour Guy, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Lucy.
@yashaga3 We are sorry about this and we look forward to your direct message. Kind regards, Lucy.

@yashaga3 Hi Yash Aga, thank you for your message and we apologize for the inconvenience caused. Could you please send us a direct message with your booking confirmation or ticket number so that we can assist you accordingly with your query.
@kimxxsophie We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we look forward to your direct message. Kind regards, Lucy.

@kimxxsophie Hi kim sophie, thank you for your message. We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Could you please send us a direct message with your personal details: Full name, Flight number and where are you flying from? So that we can search your details on our system.
@zulu__12 Thank you for your reply, Anant. We have replied to your direct message. Kind regards, Lucy.
@Flowermariotti Hi@flowermariotti, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

users.name: The Cult of Peta Cretin. (Elron Husk)
